title: Trigger draft v350+ deployment after backend filter fix

requirements.summary: Trigger and document a new draft build/deploy with version >= 350 after the backend filter fix is applied.
acceptanceCriteria: A new draft is built and deployed with a version number >= 350.
Deployed draft can be used to test generating a Full Body workout end-to-end from the UI.

file_operations.description: Append a new retry entry (e.g., Retry Attempt #4) explicitly noting the draft version target (>= 350) to trigger a new build/deploy cycle without changing runtime behavior.
